title: Oh raghuveeraa
sahitya:
O raghuvIrA ani nE pilacina O hOyana rAdA 

anupallavi

sAreku marivE sAriyanyamu jEradu nAmadi ErA dhIrA 

caraNam 1

nITajikki kari mATiki vEsAri nATakadhAri nI pATalu
pADaga 
mETi makaritala mITi gAcina daya Etiki nApai nETiki
rAdO

caraNam 2

munnu sabhanu nA pannata vEDucu ninnu keSNAyani
ennaga draupadi 
kennO valuvalicci mannana brOcina vennuDa nA
moraviNTi vO lEdA
